geekshop.controller

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • geekshop.controller.AccountController

  • @Controller
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Spring MVC controller to manage functionalities concerning shop owner's and employee's account.
    Author:
    Sebastian Döring, Felix Döring

    • Field Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String adjustPW()
      Redirects to start page if /adjustpw is mistakenly requested directly.
      java.lang.String adjustPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.lang.String newPW, java.lang.String retypePW, java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
      Saves the changed password of a user demanded after login to change his password which did not match the password rules.
      private void changeData(User user, PersonalDataForm pdf)
      Does the real work by changing the user's personal data with the given PersonalDataForm.
      java.lang.String changedData(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai, PersonalDataForm personalDataForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Saves the new user data changed by the shop owner.
      java.lang.String changedOwnData(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session, java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount, PersonalDataForm personalDataForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Saves the new user data changed by the user himself.
      java.lang.String changedOwnPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.lang.String oldPW, java.lang.String newPW, java.lang.String retypePW, java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
      Saves the new password.
      java.lang.String changedPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai, java.lang.String newPW, java.lang.String retypePW)
      Saves the new password of an employee changed by the shop owner.
      private void changePassword(User user, java.lang.String newPW)
      Does the real work by changing the user's password and updating his PasswordAttributes.
      private void dismiss(User user)
      Does the real dismissal work by removing the employee role and disabling the user account.
      java.lang.String fire(org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai)
      Dismisses an employee.
      java.lang.String fireAll()
      Dismisses all employees.
      private java.util.List<User> getEmployees()
      Creates a list of all employees needed for staff overview.
      Joke getRandomJoke(java.util.List<Joke> recentJokes)
      Determines a random Joke out of the JokeRepository which is not contained in the list of recent jokes.
      java.lang.String hire(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows the form for adding a new employee.
      java.lang.String hire(org.springframework.ui.Model model, PersonalDataForm personalDataForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Saves the new employee's data.
      java.lang.String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Shows the start page with the welome joke or, if the user's password does not match the current password rules, redirects to the respective page demanding the user to change the password according to the current password rules.
      java.lang.String profile(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
      Shows the user's profile page.
      java.lang.String profileChange(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.lang.String page, java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
      Depending on page, it shows the form either for data modification or for password change.
      java.lang.String profileChange(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai, java.lang.String page)
      Depending on page, it shows the form either for data modification or for password change of an employee.
      java.lang.String setPWRules(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows the form for changing the password safety rules.
      java.lang.String setPWRules(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map, SetRulesForm setRulesForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Saves the changed password rules.
      java.lang.String showEmployee(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai)
      Shows an employee's profile.
      java.lang.String staff(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows the overview of all employees.
      private java.lang.String urlEncode(java.lang.String str)
      Helper method to url-encode a string.
      private boolean validateNewPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.lang.String newPW, java.lang.String retypePW)
      Validates whether the given new password is not empty, is valid according to the current password rules and matches the given retyped password.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        @RequestMapping(value={"/","/index"})
public java.lang.String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                     java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount,
                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Shows the start page with the welome joke or, if the user's password does not match the current password rules, redirects to the respective page demanding the user to change the password according to the current password rules.

      • getRandomJoke

        public Joke getRandomJoke(java.util.List<Joke> recentJokes)
        Determines a random Joke out of the JokeRepository which is not contained in the list of recent jokes.

      • adjustPW

        @RequestMapping(value="/adjustpw")
public java.lang.String adjustPW()
        Redirects to start page if /adjustpw is mistakenly requested directly.

      • adjustPW

        @RequestMapping(value="/adjustpw",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String adjustPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="newPW")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String newPW,
                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="retypePW")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String retypePW,
                                                                                                   java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
        Saves the changed password of a user demanded after login to change his password which did not match the password rules.

      • staff

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_OWNER\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/staff")
public java.lang.String staff(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Shows the overview of all employees.

 @RequestMapping(value="/staff/{uai}")

                                                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="uai")
                                                                                                                             org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai)

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_OWNER\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/addemployee")
public java.lang.String hire(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Shows the form for adding a new employee.

      • hire

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_OWNER\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/addemployee",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String hire(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                   @ModelAttribute(value="personalDataForm")
                                                                                                                                                   PersonalDataForm personalDataForm,
                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Saves the new employee's data. The shop owner gets a message containing the initial password of the new user.

 @RequestMapping(value="/firestaff",

      • profileChange

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_OWNER\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/staff/{uai}/{page}")
public java.lang.String profileChange(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="uai")
                                                                                                                                     org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountIdentifier uai,
                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="page")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String page)
        Depending on page, it shows the form either for data modification or for password change of an employee.

      • changedOwnData

        @RequestMapping(value="/profile/changedata",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String changedOwnData(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                                   java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount,
                                                                                                                   @ModelAttribute(value="personalDataForm")
                                                                                                                   PersonalDataForm personalDataForm,
                                                                                                                   org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Saves the new user data changed by the user himself. If the user is an employee, a message will be sent to the shop owner.

      • changedOwnPW

        @RequestMapping(value="/profile/changepw",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String changedOwnPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="oldPW")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String oldPW,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="newPW")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String newPW,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="retypePW")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String retypePW,
                                                                                                               java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
        Saves the new password. If the password has been changed by an employee, a message will be sent to the shop owner.

      • changeData

        private void changeData(User user,
                        PersonalDataForm pdf)
        Does the real work by changing the user's personal data with the given PersonalDataForm.

      • validateNewPW

        private boolean validateNewPW(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                              java.lang.String newPW,
                              java.lang.String retypePW)
        Validates whether the given new password is not empty, is valid according to the current password rules and matches the given retyped password.
        Returns:
        true if the new password is valid

      • changePassword

        private void changePassword(User user,
                            java.lang.String newPW)
        Does the real work by changing the user's password and updating his PasswordAttributes.

      • dismiss

        private void dismiss(User user)
        Does the real dismissal work by removing the employee role and disabling the user account. However, the User cannot be removed from UserRepository because the user could be still present in current orders.

      • getEmployees

        private java.util.List<User> getEmployees()
        Creates a list of all employees needed for staff overview.

      • urlEncode

        private java.lang.String urlEncode(java.lang.String str)
        Helper method to url-encode a string.
        Parameters:
        str - String to be encoded
